snippet: The New York City Ballet performed four pieces, including “Square Dance” and “Liturgy,” on Wednesday at the David H. Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Ballet performed four pieces, including “Square Dance” and “Liturgy,” on Wednesday at the David H. Koch Theater.

headline.main: Balletic Journeys Across the Stage to Inner Worlds
headline.print_headline: Balletic Journeys Across the Stage to Inner Worlds
headline.seo: New York City Ballet: Balanchine, Wheeldon and Martins
